body_html:
I agree it would be good if there were a nicer story here.

For cases where I really want to defer the derivative (as in the original example), I've come to use the method variant, i.e. x.f(), which resolves the ambiguity and guarantees you go through the correct dispatch path. The downside is you pay an additional TensorMethod dispatch and it only works if there is a method variant.
